title: THURSDAY - Turkey Day Preview 2020
itunes:title: THURSDAY - Turkey Day Preview 2020
description:
A change to the Thanksgiving day schedule (0:08) as the Ravens vs Steelers game gets moved to Sunday. We take a look at the other two games today as the Lions take on the Texans (0:39) and the Cowboys face the Washington Football team (1:01) in a battle for first-place in the NFC East. We have some running back injury updates on Christian McCaffrey (3:09) and Austin Ekeler (3:18). Plus, a big-time QB matchup on Sunday as Patrick Mahomes goes up against Tom Brady and the Bucs (3:30)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
